attributes.action: prevent Kent Police from placing wrecked vehicles on roundabouts every Christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every Christmas, Kent Police place wrecked vehicles on local roundabouts, supposedly to draw attention to the perils of drink driving. This is an extremely dangerous and ill considered practice. It not only distracts motorists attention as they negotiate the roundabouts but creates an adverse environmental impact.
